Abilities: Str 10, Dex 15, Con 12, Int 2, Wis 14, Cha 6

Descripci\u00f3n: These birds of prey inhabit nearly every terrain and climate, though they all prefer high, secluded nesting spots.A typical eagle is about 3 feet long and has a wingspan of about 7 feet. The statistics presented here can describe any similar-sized, diurnal bird of prey.

Combate: Eagles dive at prey, raking with their powerful talons.Skills: Eagles have a +8 racial bonus on Spot checks.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: Eagle
